Thesis 5

Only a truly open internet gives you real digital freedom â€” all other solutions keep you imprisoned.

Stricter regulation of the big platforms just turns your guards into polite guards in uniform.

â€œDecentralizationâ€ within their apps and stores only builds more luxurious cells with better Wi-Fi (false decentralization).

Privacy laws and competition rules are bandages on an open wound: they slow the bleeding, but do not heal it.

Real freedom means an internet where you can speak, connect, and create something new without anyone first granting permission â€” and we can only reclaim that internet by leaving now and building a new, open space together.
